page.title: 02HOUSING IN BUCHANAN
page.content: The{houses}in the Milton of Buchanan are mostly{council houses.}There are 20 council houses and 5 farm houses. Lots of the people in the Milton are old age{pensioners.}The council houses were built in the 1940's. Some old age pensioners have lived here for 67 years in the same house. There are 9 houses in Creity Hall Drive and 13 houses in Creity Hall Road. Most of these have 2 or 3 bedrooms but one house has 7 bedrooms. The 5 farm houses are bigger than the houses in Creity Hall Drive or Road. There are 4 flats in Creity Hall Drive.
